content: {"name": "Upper Manhattan Mental Health Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "There are times when we start 30 minutes early because of weather conditions.\n", "email": "", "url": "bowencsc.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1727 Amsterdam Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10031", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.825451, "longitude": -73.94696}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 694-9200", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients may visit twice a week"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": " Emergency assistance number: 347-723-6785"}]}
